General.Name: Britania PCL
General.Description: Britania Public Company Limited engages in property development business in Thailand. It develops detached and semidetached houses, townhomes, townhouses, and other properties under the Belgravia, Grand Britania, Britania, and Brighton brand names. The company was formerly known as Origin House Company Limited. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand. Britania Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Origin Property Public Company Limited.
